articles.description: The Mahindra five-door Thar Armada sports a unique six-slot design with a horizontal slat running across, replacing the familiar grille of the three-door model.

articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Ratlam-based Kataria industries to float Rs 54.5 cr IPO on July 16 - Business Standard
articles.description: Ratlam-based Kataria Industries has fixed the price band at Rs 91 to Rs 96 per share for its Rs 54.58-crore initial public offering, the company said on Sunday.
articles.content: Incorporated in 2004, Kataria Industries Ltd has two manufacturing plants in Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh. (Representative image)
